description.value:
You add two new wizard encounter attack powers to your spellbook. The powers must be of 17th level or lower, and the two function as daily attack powers for you.

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.NW1UYE4s8ZXM9iet]{Dancing Flames}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.2BRfvct75FlQ0j4L]{Force Volley}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.CXjvdxT7YJ0h9IGE]{Mass Charm}
